languages.text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all stacks are removed.

languages.text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

languages.text: Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g}, равный числу уровней этого эффекта с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%. Затем все уровни сбрасываются.
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g}, равный числу уровней этого эффекта с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%. Затем все уровни сбрасываются.

Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g}, равный числу уровней этого эффекта с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%. Затем все уровни сбрасываются.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi bu kalkanla bir saldırı yaptığında saldırı, %50 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahiptir ve bu etkinin birikim sayısı kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} verir. Ardından tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi bu kalkanla bir saldırı yaptığında saldırı, %50 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahiptir ve bu etkinin birikim sayısı kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} verir. Ardından tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: 使用者がこのシールドで攻撃を行う際、この効果のスタック数に等しい追加の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}50%で与える。その後、すべてのスタックが取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこのシールドで攻撃を行う際、この効果のスタック数に等しい追加の{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}50%で与える。その後、すべてのスタックが取り除かれる。

languages.text: Quand l'utilisateur attaque avec ce bouclier, il inflige de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} supplémentaires égaux un nombre de cumuls de cet effet avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. Après cela, tous les cumuls sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'utilisateur attaque avec ce bouclier, il inflige de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} supplémentaires égaux un nombre de cumuls de cet effet avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}. Après cela, tous les cumuls sont supprimés.

languages.text: Greift der Träger mit diesem Schild an, verursacht er zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} in Höhe der Zahl der Stapel dieses Effektes mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Danach werden alle Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Greift der Träger mit diesem Schild an, verursacht er zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} in Höhe der Zahl der Stapel dieses Effektes mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Danach werden alle Stapel entfernt.

languages.text: Cuando el portador efectúa un ataque con este escudo, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño por energía{/g} adicional igual al número de acumulaciones de este efecto con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 50 %. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador efectúa un ataque con este escudo, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño por energía{/g} adicional igual al número de acumulaciones de este efecto con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 50 %. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.

languages.text: 当装备者使用此盾牌进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，等同于此效果层数，此次能量伤害拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。在此之后，移除所有效果层数。
languages.original_text: When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} equal to the number of this effect's stacks with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用此盾牌进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，等同于此效果层数，此次能量伤害拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。在此之后，移除所有效果层数。
